page.title: 20FIGURES & CREDITS,PULBOROUGH
page.content:
Pulborough with Nutbourne covers an area of 5283 acres. The population in 1984 was 4175. Rateable value Â£587,279
The survey of the Pulborough area was a combined effort by pupils of both St.Mary's CE (Aided) Primary School and Arundale Private Preparatory School.Thanks must be recorded to Mr.& Mrs.G.Harwood, Dr.M.Shillingford, the Post Office and local farmers for their co-operation. The slides were taken by Mr.E.R.Keevy, a member of the village Photographic Society. Pupils involved at St.Mary's School were from classes M, CB and B, with editing by Mrs.Marks, Mr.Briggs and Mr.Ellis. At Arundale School those involved were Mrs.leTissier & Form 3, Miss Lovejoy & Class 4, Mrs.Edgeley & Form 2 girls, members of Form 5 and Mrs.Cook.
